analyzed: satya dvaya avatāra nāma
namaḥ mahā kāruṇikāya
dve satye samupāśritya buddhānām dharma deśanā

original: lokasaṃvṛtisatyaṃ ca satyaṃ ca paramārthataḥ // Sda_1 //
analyzed: loka saṃvṛti satyam ca satyam ca paramārthataḥ

original: saṃvṛttirmanyate dvedhā mithyā ca tathatā tathā /
analyzed: saṃvṛttiḥ manyate dvedhā mithyā ca tathatā tathā
ādyā dvidhā udacandraḥ ca kusiddhānta vitarkaṇā
avicāra eka ramyā ca vināśa utpāda dharmiṇī
arthakriyā samarthā ca tathatā saṃvṛtiḥ matā

original: eka evaparo hyarthaḥ paraiśca dvividho mataḥ /
analyzed: ekaḥ eva paraḥ hi arthaḥ paraiḥ ca dvividhaḥ mataḥ

original: na kācid dharmatā siddhā kuto dvitryādikaṃ bhavet // Sda_4 //
analyzed: na kācid dharmatā siddhā kutas dvi tri ādikam bhavet
anutpāda nirodha ādi deśanā vākya lakṣitam

original: paramārthābhinnaśīlatvān naiva dharmā na dharmatā // Sda_5 //
analyzed: paramārtha abhinna śīla tvāt na eva dharmāḥ na dharma tā
śūnyatāyām vibhedaḥ tu kiñcid mātram na vidyate
nirvikalpa tayā bodhe śūnyatā dṛṣṭiḥ ucyate
uktam sūtre sugambhīre tad darśanam adarśanam

original: tatra draṣṭā na dṛśyaṃ cāpyanādinidhanaṃ śivam // Sda_7 //
analyzed: tatra draṣṭā na dṛśyam ca api anādinidhanam śivam
nirvikalpam nirālambam bhāva abhāva vivarjitam
anāśraya apratiṣṭhānam atulyam nirgata āgatam
anirvācyam anābhāsam nirvikāram asaṃskṛtam
yogi gamyam idam kleśa jñeya āvaraṇa varjitam
pratyakṣam anumānam ca tat dvayam bauddha sammatam
ubhābhyām śūnyatā gamyā iti arvāk dṛś moha bhāṣitam
prasajyet dharmatā jñānam tīrthike śrāvake api ca
vijñāninām ca kim vācyam mādhyamike a viruddha tā
tarhi sarve api siddhāntāḥ māna meya tayā samāḥ
sarva tarka viruddha tvāt māna meyā api dharmatā

original: bāhulyena kathaṃ na syāt pratyakṣaṃ cānumā vṛthā /
analyzed: bāhulyena katham na syāt pratyakṣam ca anumā vṛthā
tīrthya vāda nivṛti artham vidvadbhiḥ kṛtayaḥ kṛtāḥ
sa vikalpa avikalpābhyām jñānābhyām na avagamyate

original: āgame 'pi sphuṭaṃ vidvānācāryo bhavya āha ca // Sda_14 //
analyzed: āgame api sphuṭam vidvān ācāryaḥ bhavyaḥ āha ca
śūnyatā avagatā kena vyākṛtā yā tathāgataiḥ
nāga antevāsi candraḥ hi dharmatā satya darśakaḥ
tatas paramparā āmnāyaiḥ dharmatā satya gamya tā
dharma skandha sahasrāṇi catvāri uktāni aśīti ca
dharmatā antargatam sarvam muktiḥ tu śūnyatā bodheḥ
tad arthā śeṣa bhāvanā tathya saṃvṛtim ādhūya
śūnyatā abhyasane sati saṃvṛti hetoḥ puṇya ādeḥ
para lokāt ca vañcyate vivikta artham a jānānaḥ
su alpa śruti samāśritaḥ yaḥ naraḥ puṇya kṛt na asti

original: naṣṭaḥ kāpuruṣastu saḥ vināśayati durdṛṣṭā // Sda_19 //
analyzed: naṣṭaḥ kāpuruṣaḥ tu saḥ vināśayati durdṛṣṭā
śūnyatā mandamedhasam candra ācāryaḥ uvāca evam
upāya bhūtam vyavahāra satyam upeya bhūtam paramārtha satyam

original: dvayorvibhedaṃ na hi veda yo sa vrajedapāyaṃ viparītabodhāt /
analyzed: dvayoḥ vibhedam na hi veda sa vrajet apāyam viparīta bodhāt
vyavahāram an āgamya parama arthaḥ na deśyate
tathya saṃvṛti sopānam antareṇa vipaścitaḥ
tattva prāsāda śikhara ārohaṇam na hi yujyate
yathā ayam saṃvṛteḥ bhāsaḥ yuktyā kiñcid na labhyate
paramārthaḥ tu alabdha tvam ādi saṃsthita dharma tā
hetu pratyaya janya tvāt saṃvṛtiḥ bhāsa vat matā
ayuktam śodhitum ced kaiḥ jala candra ādi vinirmitam
nānā pratyaya janya tvāt siddhaḥ bhāsaḥ akhilaḥ tatas

original: pratyayānāṃ tu vicchedātsaṃvṛttyāpi na sambhavaḥ // Sda_25 //
analyzed: pratyayānām tu vicchedāt saṃvṛttyā api na sambhavaḥ
evam dṛṣṭeḥ asaṃmohāt jāte caryā viśodhane
unmārge a gamanam kṛtvā a kaniṣṭham sthānam āpnuyāt

original: āyuṣyamalpaṃ bāhulāśca vidyā āyuḥpramāṇaṃ ca kiyanna vidmaḥ /
analyzed: āyuṣyam alpam bāhulāḥ ca vidyāḥ āyuḥ pramāṇam ca kiyat na vidmaḥ
sva abhīṣṭam eva pratilambhanīyam haṃsaiḥ yathā kṣīram iva ambu madhyāt

original: arvāgdṛśā mohavaśena cāpi kṣamo na satyadvayanirṇaye 'pi /
analyzed: arvāk dṛśā moha vaśena ca api kṣamaḥ na satya dvaya nirṇaye api

original: uktīrgurūṇāmiha sampratītya nyastaṃ dvayaṃ nāgamataṃ hi satyam // Sda_28 //
analyzed: uktīḥ gurūṇām iha sampratītya nyastam dvayam nāga matam hi satyam

original: rājño 'nurodhena suvarṇadvīpe kṛte 'tra śrāddho yadi vā jano 'dya /
analyzed: rājñaḥ anurodhena suvarṇadvīpe kṛte atra śrāddhaḥ yadi vā janaḥ adya

original: gṛhṇātu samyak suparīkṣaṇena na śraddhayā naiva ca gauraveṇa // Sda_29 //
analyzed: gṛhṇātu samyak su parīkṣaṇena na śraddhayā nā eva ca gauraveṇa
sauvarṇa rājena guroḥ phalena saṃpreṣitaḥ devamatiḥ hi bhikṣuḥ

original: tasyāgrahāt satyadvayāvatāro yuktyā sudhībhistviha vīkṣaṇīyaḥ // Sda_30 //
analyzed: tasya āgrahāt satya dvaya avatāraḥ yuktyā sudhībhiḥ tu iha vīkṣaṇīyaḥ
ācārya dīpaṅkara śrī jñāna viracitaḥ satyadvayāvatāraḥ samāptaḥ
